title: Zombie Punter
description: Two friends planning for a zombie invasion have a chance to experiment when an outbreak occurs. Eugene "G" O'Donnell and Jake Mahoney can't wait to test their theories on the undead. But what if the zombies aren't the "classic" type that G and Jake fantasized about? Can they keep killing zombies once they learn the truth? Will G get over his fears and admit how he feels about Jake?
author: Zoe E. Whitten
